scenes.title: Hook
scenes.description:
Opening scene that grabs attention immediately.

**Visual:** Dark gradient background (#0f0f23 to #6366f1), large bold headline centered on screen.

**Animation:** Title slides up with spring animation (damping: 200, stiffness: 100). Subtle accent line grows from center.

**Text:** Display the main hook/headline from the script's opening line.

**Mood:** Bold, attention-grabbing, professional.

scenes.title: Content
scenes.description:
Main content scene presenting key value propositions.

**Visual:** Light background (#ffffff), left-aligned heading with bullet points below.

**Animation:** Heading fades in from left. Bullet points appear with staggered delays (15 frames apart). Each bullet has a colored accent dot.

**Text:** Extract 3 key points from the script. Display as animated bullet list.

**Mood:** Clean, informative, easy to scan.

scenes.title: CTA
scenes.description:
Closing call-to-action scene.

**Visual:** Dark background matching intro (#0f0f23). Centered CTA button with glowing effect. URL/website below in muted text.

**Animation:** CTA scales in with spring. Pulsing glow effect on button (subtle, every 2 seconds). URL fades in after button.

**Text:** Strong call-to-action phrase. Website or contact info below.

**Mood:** Urgent but professional, drives action.
